name: Garden Shifter
description:
Grow and maintain the last garden on earth in this Plant Matching Puzzle Game! 

Match 3 or more of the same tile to gain XP, refill your hunger meter, or both.
If your hunger meter hits zero, it's game over. 
Survive as long as you can and go for a high score!

Click an arrow to shift a row or column of tiles in that direction.
Line up 3 or more of the same tile to make a match! 

Every move you make lowers your hunger meter. Matching foods refills it.
Matching chests give you bonus XP. Keep your hunger meter filled to survive,
and go for XP to level up and get a high score. 

Carrots and Berry Bushes refill 3 hunger, while Beets, Wheat, and Mushrooms refill 2. 
If you survive long enough, you'll unlock new tiles that offer special abilities and tricky challenges.

Garden Shifter was made in 72 hours for the Scorespace Jam. We had a great time making it and hope you enjoy!

Art, Code, and Design: Pirhana
Music and Sound Design: Major Bruno
